RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 21600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 20. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LITTLE BLAKER showed good early foot to set the early pace along the inside, was pressured a bit from the outside near the half mile pole, opened a clear lead into the far turn and remained clear under a steady hand ride. BEAT THE DEALER settled off the early going, made an advance through the far turn, took aim at the leader near the three sixteenths pole but couldn't match to finished second best while racing three to four wide. DEER CREEK ROAD was unhurried early on, raced near the inside around the far turn through the stretch and moved up late to improve position. HANSENATION tracked the early leader down the backstretch, put pressure on Little Blaker past the half mile pole. DR. ZARNETT stalked the pace along the inside, raced five deep into the upper stretch and faded. SAMMY DA BULL dropped back early, raced four wide near the three sixteenths pole and had no response.

ENTRY.NAME: Deer Creek Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, inside bid, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Sammy Da Bull
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Little Blaker
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace inside, well clear, hand ride

ENTRY.NAME: Beat the Dealer
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, aim 3/16, second best, 3-4 wide

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 14100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAPTIVATING ART showed good early foot to set the early pace along the inside, raced near the four path in the lane and held gamely to be clear under strong handling. LELAWALA settled off the early going, moved up near the rail around the far turn through the stretch and finished well to get up for the place position late. UNCAPTURED FAITH stalked the pace, raced five to six wide into the upper stretch and kept on to the wire. FIONA raced mid pack early on, made a five wide bid passing the five sixteenths pole and flattened out. LUCKYWISE stalked the early going, raced near the inside through the upper stretch and had not enough in the drive. MAIDEN ROCK was unhurried early, was six deep near the three sixteenths pole and lacked a rally. PLAYFUL SUMMER was off slowly, lost a considerable amount of ground at the start, angled widest through the stretch and had no rally. HERO'S DAUGHTER chased the early pace, hard ridden into the far turn, raced two deep between and faded. CONDUTTORE hesitated at the break, raced four wide around the far turn and never threatened. HOPS PETUNIA failed to sustain a bid. GRANADICA dropped back early, raced near the inside to save ground and never menaced.

ENTRY.NAME: Playful Summer
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, angled widest lane, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Captivating Art
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace inside, held gamely, driving, 4-path lane

ENTRY.NAME: Lelawala
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, rail bid, up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Conduttore
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Granadica
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, saved ground, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Hops Petunia
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Uncaptured Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 5-6 wide upper stretch, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Luckywise
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, inside upper stretch, not enough

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 95. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 27500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR ENTERED TO BE CLAIMED FOR $25,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-wi nners Of A Race Since January 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEMPLEMENT pressed the early leader from the outside, took command through the turn and raced well clear through the stretch run under steady pressure. CONTENT showed good early foot to set the early pace from the inside but was no match for the winner in the drive. MYSTIQUE SABOTEUR chased the early pace, steadied slightly near the five sixteenths pole, raced three wide through the upper stretch and had not enough for the top pair. Jockey of Mystique Saboteur claimed objection against Content and stewards ruled no change. BAREBACK FUN was off slowly, waited for racing room past the five sixteenths pole and raced even late with no closing run. Jockey of Bareback Fun claimed objection on Mystique Saboteur for interference and stewards ruled no change. SWEET QUEEN BEE raced two wide between near the quarter pole and lacked a bid. AFERDITA stalked the pace and faded while racing from the outside. CHACALOSA raced off the early going, swung five wide into the upper stretch, angled in and never threatened.

ENTRY.NAME: Bareback Fun
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, traffic, waited 5/16, even late

ENTRY.NAME: Mystique Saboteur
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, slight steady 5/16, 3 wide, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Chacalosa
ENTRY.COMMENT: swung 5wd upper stretch, shifted in, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Templement
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside foe, well clear, kept to pressure

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: B.D. Gibbs Farm, LLC & Fleetwood Bloodstock, LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 27500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 20 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowance s) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CANDY ISLAND showed good early speed to set the early pace, drifted through the stretch and prevailed under all out pressure. ITSALLABOUTACTION tracked the early leader while racing just off the inside and finished gamely to the wire. BEAV'S BOO stalked the top trio down the backstretch, moved up four to five wide in the lane and slowly closed in on the top pair. ESTILO ELEGANTE raced off the early pace, swung six to seven wide into the upper stretch and moved up with a good late bid. GIRLINTHEFIREPLACE race mid pack early, was near the inside past the quarter pole and had no final winning bid. LITTLE BIRD FLASH stalked the pace along the inside and faded. BOURBON BUNS broke awkwardly, raced near the back of the pack early on, was four deep near the three sixteenths pole and never threatened. DUNVEGAN DOLL dropped back early on, raced from the outside in the lane and lacked a bid;. QUARANTINA raced wide into the first turn and never menaced.

ENTRY.NAME: Candy Island
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, set pace, drifted stretch, prevailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Little Bird Flash
ENTRY.OWNER: The Estate of Frank F Romocean

ENTRY.NAME: Dunvegan Doll
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, outside lane, lacked bid

ENTRY.NAME: Girlinthefireplace
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, inside 1/4, no final bid

ENTRY.NAME: Estilo Elegante
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, swung 6-7 wide upper stretch, moved up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 94. Claiming Purse 17500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 20. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIRST CITIZEN stalked the pace, made a strong four to five wide bid through the far turn and held gamely to be clear under strong encouragement. TRAGICALLY QUEWICK stalked early on, raced three wide between near the quarter pole and finished willingly to the wire. SONNYISNOTSOFUNNY was off a step slow, raced with the second flight early, made an advance through the far turn, raced five to six wide in the lane and kept on willingly to the wire. RIVERBOAT GAMBLER was off a step slow, moved up from the outside into the upper stretch to challenge and flattened out. MAKING ME CRAZY raced off the early going, was along the inside through the far turn, shifted three to four wide and moved up late to improve position. ALACRITOUS showed good early foot to set the early pace and weakened. JACK'S ADVANTAGE dropped back early, raced five deep near the three sixteenths pole and had no late response. SOUTHERN WILL dropped back early, raced six to seven wide into the upper stretch and had no late rally. AMIGO'S AFFAIR pressed the early pace while racing just off the inside and gave way. CRAFTY CONQUEST stalked early on while racing four wide and failed to sustain a bid.

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Making Me Crazy
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, inside turn, angled 3-4 wide, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Riverboat Gambler
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, outside bid, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Southern Will
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, 6-7w upper stretch, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Crafty Conquest
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4-wide, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: First Citizen
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4-5 wide bid turn, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 72. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CULDEE was bumped at the start, rated along the inside down the backstretch, asked nearing the three eighths pole, was blocked, angled four wide through the upper lane and just got up in a long drive under all out pressure. DONNARUMMA showed good early foot to a pressured pace along the inside, dug in late and just missed in a game effort. CANDYMONIUM was coaxed along to press Donnarumma from the outside down the backstretch and weakened a bit in the drive. HURRY UP CHIC CHIC stalked the early going, raced three to four wide into the lane and raced evenly with no closing run. TIME FOR CUPID was unhurried early on, fanned seven wide into the upper stretch and moved up to imprrove position. ASHWICKEN was bumped at the start, raced near the rail past the quarter pole, angled five deep and had no late rally. FULL TIME STRUTIN dropped back off the pace, raced two to three wide and had no response. DINAH JO raced five to six wide through the first turn, was four deep near the quarter pole and never threatened. IMA SURE BET settled off the pace and failed to respond. ICY RAIN raced far back and never threatened.

ENTRY.NAME: Ashwicken
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, inside 1/4, shifted 5-wide, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Culdee
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, rated, blocked 3/8, inside, shifted 4wd, just up

ENTRY.NAME: Time for Cupid
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, fanned 7wd upper stretch, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Ima Sure Bet
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, failed to respond,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UHAVETOBEKITTENME was rated along early, made a four wide bid through the far turn and finished well to prove best under strong handling. JULIE'S FERRARI stalked the pace, was blocked nearing the quarter pole, found room to race from the inside and finished gamely to the wire. EXONERATED PREZ pressed the early pace while racing between rivals early on, experienced traffic deep stretch, angled out and finished willingly to the wire. Jockey of Exonerated Prez claimed objection against the winner for interference and stewards ruled no change. NOT A GAME pressed outside of foes and weakened in the drive. STAY THIRSTY AMIGO raced off the early going, raced from the outside in the stretch and had not enough. SCORSESE raced in tight quarters soon after the start, raced four wide near the quarter pole and had no late rally. REINSURE was slow early to race near the back of the pack early, angled widest through the stretch run and never threatened. GATTO MARRONE raced with the second flight early, was near the inside around the far turn and lacked a bid. JOCULARITY showed good early foot to set the pace from the inside and gave way. TURN THE SWITCH dropped back early, raced from the outside in the lane and never was a factor. HEY SACH failed to sustain a bid and raced far back late.

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Sach
ENTRY.COMMENT: far back, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Julie's Ferrari
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, inside, blocked 1/4 pole, inside, game

ENTRY.NAME: Gatto Marrone
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside turn, lacked bid

ENTRY.NAME: Exonerated Prez
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed between, traffic, angled deep stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Turn the Switch
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, outside lane, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Stay Thirsty Amigo
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, outside bid, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Reinsure
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, angled widest lane, no bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 93. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 20 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UOTTALIKEIT vied for the early lead from the outside of foe, took command near the three eighths marker and held a clear late under steady pressure. EL MARRO raced off the early going, made a three wide bid around the far turn and finished second best. SHANGHAI PRINCE stalked the pace, raced three wide past the quarter pole and kept on to the wire. CLAW settled off the early going, raced five to six wide through the upper lane and raced evenly with no late rally. CHACO SPIRIT raced mid pack early on, angled widest in the stretch and had no late rally. DUKE OF DARKNESS vied for the early lead from the inside and gave way. DECEITFUL ANTHONY was coaxed along early from the inside and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Chaco Spirit
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, angled widest stretch, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Shanghai Prince
ENTRY.OWNER: Cline Robert C Reed Stephen and Sugar John J

ENTRY.NAME: El Marro
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3wd bid turn, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHANEL SPIRIT dueled while racing outside of foe and remained clear late under a steady hand ride. SEEYOUINMOTOWN raced off the early going, moved up two deep past the quarter pole, angled to race five wide inside the upper stretch and was slowly gaining ground on the leader late in a game effort. PRONTO CHARLI stalked the pace along the inside, hard ridden through the far turn and was no match for the top pair to race along for third. BONNIE'S BEST was off slowly, rushed from the inside to duel early on and weakened. LADYBUGGIN dropped back to race mid pack and failed to have a response. VAMONOS PIACENTE settled off the early going, raced along the inside around the far turn and never menaced. KISS VALENTINA pressed the early pace while racing three wide from the outside of foes and faded. MI CANCION was unhurried early on, raced six wide near the three sixteenths pole and never was a factor. INCREDIBLE MARINI dropped back early, raced near the inside around the far turn into the upper stretch and lacked a bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Bonnie's Best
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, rushed inside, duel, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Chanel Spirit
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
